Attributes.description: Examines the concept of evaluation in health services and how various methodological approaches can be used in evaluative studies.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of HCEP 400, HCEP 502 or (b) all of SPPH 400, SPPH 502.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 12:00
